document.full_text: amazon.com inc  is well-positioned to grab market share from wal-mart stores inc  and target corp  given its competitive pricing and wide assortment, analysts at william blair & co said, and upgraded amazon to "outperform."
document.title: amazon set to grab market share from wal-mart: william blair
lines_and_colors: amazon.com inc  is well-positioned to grab market share from wal-mart stores inc  and target corp  given its competitive pricing and wide assortment, analysts at william blair & co said, and upgraded amazon to "outperform."
